objects.name: Analytic 1188
objects.description: Creation, deletion, or modification of security groups and firewall rules in cloud control plane logs that expand access to cloud resources beyond expected baselines. Defender view: unexpected ingress/egress rules permitting 0.0.0.0/0 or opening atypical ports, often correlated with privileged role or API key activity.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: AWS:CloudTrail
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Ingress rule creation or modification for security group

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: AWS:CloudTrail
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Removal of restrictive egress rules from a security group

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Whitelist approved IP ranges; detect unexpected addition of 0.0.0.0/0 or untrusted CIDRs.
Define expected ports for services; flag additions outside this range (e.g., SSH/RDP open to all).
Tune alerts based on whether changes are made by break-glass or admin roles versus automation accounts.
Correlate rule changes with subsequent suspicious network activity to reduce false positives.
